item.title: 【Cinema Center】the toxic avenger 2023 movie download
item.description:
The Toxic Avenger Unrated is a 2023 American superhero black comedy splatter film written and directed by Macon Blair. It is the fifth installment, a reboot of The Toxic Avenger film series, and a remake of the 1984 film. The film stars Peter Dinklage as the title character, alongside Jacob Tremblay, Taylour Paige, Julia Davis, Jonny Coyne, Elijah Wood, and Kevin Bacon.

The Toxic Avenger premiered as the opening film of Fantastic Fest on September 21, 2023, with a wider theatrical release followed by Cineverse and Iconic Events Releasing in the United States for August 29, 2025.

The film has received positive reviews from critics.

AUDIO AVAILABLE HERE

Plot/Description: A horrible toxic accident transforms downtrodden janitor, Winston Gooze into a new evolution of hero: The Toxic Avenger.

Set in a fantasy world, the film follows janitor Winston Gooze, who, after a freak accident, transforms into a mutant vigilante known as Toxie. Armed with his mop, the unlikely hero battles freaks, gangsters and corrupt CEOs while trying to save his relationship with his son

On the review aggregator website Rotten Tomatoes, 83% of 106 critics' reviews are positive. The website's consensus reads: "Like the original, The Toxic Avenger isn't for everyone – but viewers seeking an extremely gory, extremely silly good time won't be disappointed."[38] Metacritic, which uses a weighted average, assigned the film a score of 67 out of 100, based on 20 critics, indicating "generally favorable" reviews

Marina


This movie was an absolute blast from start to finish! The Toxic Avenger is everything you’d want from a modern take on a cult classic: funny, ridiculously over-the-top, and full of gloriously gory mayhem.


The tone strikes a perfect balance between absurd comedy and full-throttle action-horror.


was laughing out loud at some of the one-liners and wild situations, and the violence is so cartoonishly extreme that it never feels mean-spirited—just hilariously insane.


The effects deserve a special shout-out. The practical gore is top-tier—oozing, exploding, splattering in all the best ways—and the CG blends in surprisingly well, giving it that polished-yet-playfully-gross aesthetic.


You can tell the filmmakers were having a ton of fun with it, and that energy carries through in every scene.


Whether you’re a longtime fan of Troma’s original or just in the mood for something outrageous, Toxic Avenger totally delivers. It’s got heart, guts (literally), and a sense of humor sharper than a mop-wielding mutant vigilante. Highly recommended for fans of campy horror, inventive gore, and movies that know exactly what they are—and lean all the way in.
item.author: lareve
